languages.text: "А его пес..." {n}Вигдис умолкает, переводя взгляд на кибермастифа, и прячет руку за спиной.{/n} "Я смиренно прошу вас принять меры".

traits.locale_text: "А его собака..." {n}Вигдис умолкает, переводя взгляд на кибермастифа, и прячет руку за спиной.{/n} "Я смиренно прошу вас принять меры".

languages.text: "And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis pauses, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."
languages.original_text: "А его пес..." {n}Вигдис умолкает, переводя взгляд на кибермастифа, и прячет руку за спиной.{/n} "Я смиренно прошу вас принять меры".

traits.locale_text: "And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis falls silent, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."
"And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis falls silent, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."
"And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis falls silent, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."
"And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis pauses, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."
"And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis pauses, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."

languages.text: 「それから、彼の犬についてですが…」{n}ヴィグディスは言葉を切り、サイバーマスチフに視線を移しながら、手を背後に隠した。{/n}「謹んで、何らかの対処をお願い申し上げます」
languages.original_text: "And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis pauses, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."

traits.locale_text: 「それから、彼の犬についてですが…」{n}ヴィグディスは言葉を切り、サイバーマスチフに視線を移しながら、手を背後に隠した。{/n}「謹んで、何らかの対処をお願い申し上げます」

languages.text: "Köpeğiyle ilgili de..." {n}Duraksayan Vigdis, bakışlarını siber mastife kaydırıp ellerini arkasında birleştiriyor.{/n} "Saygılarımla bir aksiyon almanızı arz ederim."
languages.original_text: "And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis pauses, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."

traits.locale_text: "Köpeğiyle ilgili de..." {n}Duraksayan Vigdis, bakışlarını siber mastife kaydırır ve ellerini arkasında birleştirir.{/n} "Saygılarımla bir aksiyon almanızı arz ederim."

languages.text: «En cuanto a su perro...». {n}Vigdis hace una pausa, mirando al cibermastín y guardándose la mano a la espalda.{/n} «Solicito humildemente que haga algo».
languages.original_text: "And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis pauses, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a su perro...». {n}Vigdis hace una pausa, mirando al cibermastín y guardándose la mano a la espalda.{/n} «Solicito humildemente que haga algo».

languages.text: “至于他的狗……”{n}维格迪斯顿了顿，将目光转向了那只生化獒犬，将手藏在了身后。{/n}“我谦卑地请求您采取行动。”
languages.original_text: "And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis pauses, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."

traits.locale_text: “至于他的狗……”{n}维格迪斯顿了顿，将目光转向了那只生化獒犬，将手藏在了身后。{/n}“我谦卑地请求您采取行动。”

languages.text: « Quant à son chien... {n}Vigdis s'interrompt pour observer le cyber-mastiff tout en cachant sa main dans son dos.{/n} Je vous demande humblement d'agir au plus vite. »
languages.original_text: "And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis pauses, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à son chien... {n}Vigdis s'interrompt pour observer le cyber-mastiff tout en cachant sa main dans son dos.{/n} Je vous demande humblement d'agir au plus vite. »

languages.text: "Und was seinen Hund angeht ..." {n}Vigdis mach eine Pause, wendet ihren Blick dem Cyber-Mastiff zu und legt ihre Hand auf den Rücken.{/n} "Ich bitte Euch demütig, etwas zu unternehmen."
languages.original_text: "And as for his dog..." {n}Vigdis pauses, shifting her gaze to the cyber-mastiff and tucking her hand behind her back.{/n} "I humbly request that you take action."

traits.locale_text: "Und was seinen Hund angeht ..." {n}Vigdis mach eine Pause, wendet ihren Blick dem Cyber-Mastiff zu und legt ihre Hand auf den Rücken.{/n} "Ich bitte Euch demütig, etwas zu unternehmen."
